title: Mythos
content: [](http://photos1.blogger.com/img/254/1836/640/berus1.jpg) Cornelia with her pet BerusFrom Tara's toy chest. I mentioned I'd share a photo of Berus (a nickname for [Cerberus](http://www.loggia.com/myth/cerberus.html)) once I got my digital camera replaced (see last two paragraphs of [Children's Program](http://worldgame.blogspot.com/2005/02/childrens-program.html)).I had a Fujifilm FinePix 2600 Zoom (2 megapixels), but the battery hatch broke off. I replaced it with an Olympus Stylus 500 (5 megapixels).
author: Kirby Urner
